quoteText:
We use data to build better services

We use the information we collect from all our services for the following purposes:
title: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes

tosdr.case: This service uses your personal information for many different purposes
tosdr.tldr:
List (summarized):
"We use the information we collect from all our services for the following purposes: Provide our services[...] Maintain &amp. improve our services[...] Develop new services[...] Provide personalized services, including content and ads[...] Communicate with you[...]"
